blog.name: mohndemaury
blog.title: moi c'est eliott
blog.description: 21. bi. she/her. j'aime bien les gens surprenants

tags: i just wanted to let it out bc it's been bothering me for a while
summary: there's this one thing that bothers me a lot in the skam fandom - some people (basically white feminists) thinking the vilde...
body: there’s this one thing that bothers me a lot in the skam fandom - some people (basically white feminists) thinking the vilde character being lesbian/female magically removes the character’s racist behaviour? it was the same in the skam og fandom and it’s still the same. daphné is racist. she is selfish. as a muslim person, i don’t like her, hell i can’t stand her right now. i don’t want to see her, especially right now. so excuse me for preferring an eliott season over a daphné season. an arthur season? nah, he’s not that interesting. an alexia season? hell yeah. an eliott season? hell yeah. a yann season? hell yeah. people preferring an eliott or a yann season over a daphné season is not misogyny, well at least not for everyone, because you gotta admit she’s a hard character to like for us muslim people and poc.

blog.name: anotherskamblog
blog.title: oh my god it's yet another skam blog
blog.description: V, 23, she/they. I had to make a sideblog for all my Skam nonsense, so here it is. Mainly Skam, Skam NL, Skam España, Druck, and Skam France. Main: skeletondragon

summary: About Imane and Sofiane...
title: About Imane and Sofiane...
body:
I’m genuinely wondering how the writers plan on wrapping up the Imane and Sofiane storyline. I don’t expect them to completely disregard it (this season has been messy but that would be straight up incompetent), but I’m struggling to see how they can provide any sort of satisfying resolution. 

The last we saw Sofiane, he punched out Charles. The last we heard from him, he was being petty to Imane about not contacting her. You can make a decent argument that he was just lashing out from getting his feelings hurt (it’s not nice, but he’s human so it at least makes sense), but that doesn’t exactly leave him and Imane in a good place.

So, not only do these two have the deeper issues of religion and race (remember when Imane’s mom mentioned how she’s not a fan of Imane’s potential BF being Arab? Is that ever going to be brought up again??), they have to deal with the whole thing of Sofiane dating Manon! 

So obviously, we as viewers only ever see a 10-week snippet of our main’s lives. Not everything needs to be neatly concluded at the end of the season. After all, Yousef and Sana ended their season together and all of their issues definitely weren’t solved. However, there has to be at least some semblance of a conclusion, or at least a solid direction the characters are headed, otherwise it all feels pointless. 

I’m waiting to see how this will play out, but I’m frankly not super hopeful.

blog.description: Ellie. 27. salty marshmallow 💖💜💙 bi as hell. FR/NL. skam france blog with a side of nl. eliott demaury owns my soul tbh

summary: I agree with you. It doesn’t seem well thought out at all, may be there’s more coming?? like, eliott cutting all his ties with...
question: I agree with you. It doesn’t seem well thought out at all, may be there’s more coming?? like, eliott cutting all his ties with his former friends but seems chill when he talked to imane about idriss and sofiane and when lucas said he was talking to idriss,he was quite chill? like?? shouldn’t he seem a bit distressed?? i really thought they were going w idriss being gay and rejecting eliott plot and I’m bitter
answer: Yeahhh also agree about the bi Idriss thing. Hope there is more to come regardless. The thing is however I feel like Eliott is pretty good at pretending to be chill when he’s not at times (like with Lucas about the whole Lucille thing and his Mi too) that he ccompartmentalizes a lot in order to cope. But yeah I still think Idriss’s reaction at the party was still ??? As is the fact that they never tried to reach out to Eliott tbh…

summary: You know what I liked about this clip? It wasn't about Imane wanting to be friends with those girls who clearly need some white...
body: You know what I liked about this clip? It wasn’t about Imane wanting to be friends with those girls who clearly need some white guy to explain racism to them rather than listening to her. It was about her fixing her relationship with her brother, whilst still holding her ground and being her awesome self and her rekindling her friendship with Jamilah who actually is amazing and deserving of her friendship.

tags: i'm sick of pple acting like 'they are building up and nothing happens'

summary: But like, whatever might happen with Eliott and Idriss, no matter how much we don't get to actually witness on s4, it doesn't...
body:
But like, whatever might happen with Eliott and Idriss, no matter how much we don’t get to actually witness on s4, it doesn’t undermind the fact that it does happen and the feelings Eliott might have upon seeing Idriss and Sofiane surfacing back in his life

It’s not because there’s no carefully laid out conversations and clips to watch that it doesn’t happen and will never exist

tags: pls dont come in my ask box with complaints
summary:
Thanos x Eliott (skam fr) enemies to lovers au 
au where Thanos and Eliott HATE each other. But not really because Thanos had a...
body:
Thanos x Eliott (skam fr) enemies to lovers au

au where Thanos and Eliott HATE each other. But not really because Thanos had a crush on Elliott’s skinny white ass but he was just scared and intimidated because Eliott has a girlfriend😔👊🏽. But anyway they hang out a few time because they’re helping refurbish the common room and Thanos plays the piano for Eliott 🎶 🎹 😩 and they share some steamy eye contact but then he sees Eliott with his girlfriend later 💔👩🏼🚫. So Thanos writes this on Elliott’s mirror

Eliott realises that he fucked up and breaks up with Lucille because we’re not about to cheat. After a party one night they almost kiss 😳 but they’re interrupted. Eventually they have their first kiss in the rain 🥵🤙🏽. Eliott tells his friends and Thanos becomes friends with them. They stay together 🥰 and have 4 white blonde daughters 👧🏼, Ashley, Ashleigh, Ashlee and Ashlie 👨‍👨‍👧‍👧

-

tags: i miss them can you tell?
summary: hello yes, right now lucas and eliott are laying in bed right now and lucas stopped studying awhile ago because eliott fell...
body: hello yes, right now lucas and eliott are laying in bed right now and lucas stopped studying awhile ago because eliott fell asleep and he looks absolutely breathtaking in the low reading light and lucas can’t help himself from watching the slow rise of eliott’s chest and the way his face twitches like he’s dreaming and lucas is once again reminded how lucky he is to have found eliott and how grateful he is that they were able to save each other and his heart is so full of love for the soft man next to him that he’s pretty sure it’ll burst.

summary: Remember how Eliott said “maybe he doesn’t want to see me” when Lucas told him Idriss left? Can you believe that after all this...
body: Remember how Eliott said “maybe he doesn’t want to see me” when Lucas told him Idriss left? Can you believe that after all this time Eliott still believed his friends wouldn’t want to see him or have him around because of his MI? I’m so sad :(

blog.name: flying-elliska
blog.title: Flying Elliska
blog.description: Ellie. 27. salty marshmallow 💖💜💙 bi as hell. FR/NL. skam france blog with a side of nl. eliott demaury owns my soul tbh

summary: ok but there’s one thing I don’t understand from this clip though and that’s how they’ve written Eliott’s backstory with the...
body:
ok but there’s one thing I don’t understand from this clip though and that’s how they’ve written Eliott’s backstory with the Bakhellals. 

Imane probably learned that Eliott was bipolar after Lucas did ; but then how does she know that he had an episode when he kissed Idriss ? And why would she assume Idriss knows ? I mean that’s not exactly something you go around telling people. If that’s the case, it feels like she’s being very flippant about it and that’s not very Imane-like. 

Or, option 2, she learned when he had this episode that led him to kiss Idriss and drop out of school but then, how does Imane know and Idriss doesn’t ? 

And what’s the whole timing of this ? We know Idriss graduated last year, and Eliott didn’t because he missed exams so that might have been the timing of their fallout ; then Eliott went back to school but dropped out and switched high school in the middle of this year. But why did he drop out of his school in the middle of this school year, did he simply have another episode ? If the thing with Idriss happened this year then why did he drop out of school since Idriss isn’t going to school anymore ?

The whole timing of this feels very all over the place ; and Imane and Idriss’ conversation about this just feels…Weird. Like idk don’t siblings talk to each other about their friends ? Like tbh when my sister has a falling out with one of her friends I usually know all about it lmao. 

I don’t know the whole thing doesn’t look very well thought out to me and that’s very frustrating. I do like to think though that Imane and Eliott had a conversation at some point where he explained what happened to her because I do think their relationship is lovely and i wish they’d developped it more

also : let eliott tell his own story ffs

summary: i’ve almost forgot, i wanted to tell how much i appreciate that when idriss said that eliott is okay and moved on imane said “i...
body: i’ve almost forgot, i wanted to tell how much i appreciate that when idriss said that eliott is okay and moved on imane said “i don’t think so” because there were so many people saying that eliott is chill and moved on and it didn’t affect him that much and he doesn’t miss his friends, which wasn’t true at all, i’m so happy that imane noticed that and told idriss about it (and all of us)
